name: Reflection (itch) (dreary✧prince)
description:
It's a good time to reflect on the past and rest.

─

Reflection is a short visual novel about some of my experiences in winter.

Read time is an estimated 10-15 minutes.

Content Warnings: implied past self-harm (visual), implied abuse (story)

Recommended for ages 14+

Language: English

(message me if you'd like to volunteer to add a translation)

For visually-impaired readers, Ren'Py offers a self-voicing option by pressing V when you open the visual novel. This will lower the volume of the music and allow you to hear the text being read to you via the default voice on your computer.

─

‣ 12 painted images

‣ 3 songs mixed with ambience

‣ ~10-15 minutes of story

─

CREDITS: 

All credits for coding, story, art, and music go to drearyprince.

Ambience/SFX: 

  • YVHNII: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/sounds-of-the-gloomy-city-of-the-future-126442
  • cobratronik: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/wind-artic-cold-6195

The game was built in Ren'Py.

─

Want updates on my next project? You can check my Twitter! 

This is my first game-jam project and I finished in about 3 days. It may be rough around the edges, but I appreciate constructive feedback.

The story takes place in winter and talks about winter, both metaphorically and literally.
